markdown.markdown:
Hi there üëã I'm Senthil Kumar üë®‚Äçüíª

I am an Applied ML Engineer specialized in building Natural Language Processing applications using ML and DL.
This is my blog Learn by Blogging

I'm here to pen my learnings in Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning and Software Engineering. The range of my topics include various NLP topics, some mathematics fundamentals, a lot of coding concepts, Cloud related topics, tool tips and more. Predominantly, I write more code-first learning approaches to different topics.

I understand what I write here could just be a drop in an ocean of good materials out there. This is my humble attempt to keep learning, unlearning and relearning as much as possible by writing about them.

Hit me up in LinkedIn if what I do interests you !

How I `Learn by Blogging`

![](mermaid_diagram.png)

Want to sample any of my blog post?

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple" collapse="true"} [![](blog_page_snapshot.png)](https://senthilkumarm1901.quarto.pub/learn-by-blogging/blog.html) ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple" collapse="true"} ## [My Blog Post 1 in Toyota Connected India Medium Space](https://medium.com/toyota-connected-india/a-gentle-introduction-to-jmespath-an-intuitive-way-to-parse-json-documents-daa6d699467a) [![TCIN Blog by Senthil Kumar](tcin_blog_1_by_author.png)](https://medium.com/toyota-connected-india/a-gentle-introduction-to-jmespath-an-intuitive-way-to-parse-json-documents-daa6d699467a) ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple" collapse="true"} ## [My Blog Post 2 in Toyota Connected India Medium Space](https://medium.com/toyota-connected-india/boost-your-productivity-with-bash-script-recipes-daec4a244997) [![TCIN Blog by Senthil Kumar](tcin_blog_2_by_author.png)](https://medium.com/toyota-connected-india/boost-your-productivity-with-bash-script-recipes-daec4a244997) :::
